info.title: More Recipes
info.description:
# Introduction
API for the MoreRecipes Web App

# Overview
MoreRecipes is a recipe management web app (We know you love to try new things, especially new tastes) built with Node/ExpressJS (Backend) and ReactJS/MaterializeCSS (FrontEnd). This is documentation for the API built with ExpressJS.

# Authentication
A JSONWebToken generated during user signup/signin is required for recipe action routes. This token should be included in the 'authorization' portion of the request headers

# Error Codes
201 - A resource is successfully created (e.g. user account creation or adding a new recipe)
200 - Get resources
400 - Request parameters are invalid
401 - Invalid, expired or excluded token which is required for a request
403 - Voting or reviewing a recipe for a recipe owner
